ComicInfo.Title: A Tale of Rot
ComicInfo.Summary:
A TALE OF ROT
STANDALONE ONE-SHOT
The Rotter... the man cursed to live forever, as his body continues to decompose. He's roped Robyn and Marian into helping him break the spell, but to do so, they must journey into his past - which might be a bit darker than they bargained for.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ken Lashley & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Roberta Ingranata & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Jen Broomall & Stephen Schaffer | 3 | D | Zenescope Year 10 Anniversary Cover | Dawn McTeigue (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
